alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Northern Outer Banks; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:55PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dare and Tyrrell Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 1254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Frying Pan Landing, or 22 miles west of Stumpy Point, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kill Devil Hills, Manns Harbor, Nags Head, Alligator, Gum Neck, Mashoes, Manteo, Columbia, East Lake, Colington, Whalebone, Newfoundland, Buffalo City, Frying Pan Landing, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Wright Brothers National Monument, Nags Head Fishing Pier, Avalon Pier and Wanchese. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Dare; Northern Outer Banks; Tyrrell
